name: VR Final
description:
This is my Motion Capture/VR final project! In includes some of my old models and animations, as well as some of my previous motion captures. Many of these things are also interactable as well. There is more included than what is shown in the video, so please check it out!

You can find the source code on my GitHub here: https://github.com/ililiA/Mocap-VR-Final.git

Make sure you go to the VR Stuff branch for the correct version, and the scene you want to open is VR_Interations to access what is shown here!
